reasoning: Global colorectal cancer incidence ~20-25 per 100k (GLOBOCAN 2005). Stage II represents approximately 30-40% of incident cases at diagnosis. Estimated Stage II incidence ~8.5 per 100k based on TNM staging distribution. Confidence reflects reliance on proportional staging data rather than direct Stage II registry.
source: Parkin DM et al. (2005). Global cancer statistics, 2002. CA Cancer J Clin. 55(2):74-108
